name: Tomodachi Collection
description:
Tomodachi Collection is a game developed by Nintendo SPD Group 1. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Tomodachi Collection on Nintendo 3DS and Nintendo DS.
Yoshio Sakamoto produced the game. Ryutaro Takahashi directed the game. It was scored by Asuka Ito, Daisuke Shiiba and Riyu Tamura.
